articles.title: Erin Patterson gives evidence at mushroom lunch murder trial - BBC
articles.description: The Australian woman has pleaded not guilty to four charges - three of murder and one of attempted murder.
articles.content:
Tiffanie Turnbull
The Australian woman accused of killing three relatives and gravely injuring another with a toxic mushroom meal has taken to the witness stand at her trial.
Erin Patterson has ple… [+2673 chars]
